title: Quiet Scandinavian Apartment with Walk-In Closet in Oltaszyn
description: Discover understated luxury in this minimalist two-bedroom, two-bath apartment, spanning 73 sqm. Floor-to-ceiling windows infuse the open-plan layout with natural light, while subtle Scandinavian touches and oak accents bring warmth to the space. A spacious walk-in closet allows for clutter-free living. The laundry room and practical layouts make daily routines seamless.
neighborhood_description: Nestled in Wroclaw’s peaceful Oltaszyn, this community-focused area enjoys a sense of safety and vibrant urban living. Residents benefit from quiet green promenades, helpful neighbors, and easy access to local artisan cafés and convenience stores. Swift highway connections pair convenience with a comfortable city retreat.
target_buyer: Ideal for young couples seeking harmonious living close to urban amenities, with efficient spaces for working or relaxing together.
market_positioning: Positioned competitively for buyers valuing quality finishes and community living, this apartment blends contemporary Scandinavian design with a focus on practicality and eco-conscious details in one of Wroclaw’s most sought-after neighborhoods.
